entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
